pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, May 10, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
